directions: Mix ground flax seeds, oat bran, quick-cooking oats, brown rice, raisins, and cinnamon together in a container with a lid. Pour in soy milk; stir to make sure flaxseed mixture is suspended in milk.
Cover and refrigerate until oats soften, at least 6 hours. Uncover and stir before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 cup soy milk, or more as needed
title: Overnight Muesli
